attributes.action: impose a licence on all retailers who wish to sell tobacco and tobacco products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Retailers require a licence to sell alcohol, but not tobacco.  This petition seeks to impose such a licence, banded according to the retailer's annual turnover, and make breaking of this and related age legislation punishable by removal of this licence (in addition to existing punitive measures).  All income thus generated shall be used to fund NHS treatment and research of smoking-related illness, and to fund additional Customs & Excise manpower to combat illegal smuggling.
